summary: Daedric Falmer, armour and weapons, all with glow maps!
descriptionHtml:
Ironman5000 Retextures - Fiendish Falmer Creatures, Armour and Weapons
======================================================================

Description:

This mod is a retexture of the Falmer creatures including their armour and weapons which are also wearable when available for looting.
  
!Spoiler! You can gain the Falmer items via console (tilde key) by typing player.additem then entering these codes;

    00038340 - Falmer Bow
    00083167 - Falmer Supple Bow
    000302CD - Falmer War Axe
    0006F700 - Honed Falmer War Axe
    0002E6D1 - Falmer Sword
    0006F6FF - Honed Falmer Sword
    0005C06C - Falmer Shield
    0004C3CB - Falmer Helmet
    000B83CB - Falmer Armor
    000B83CD - Falmer Boots
    000B83CF - Falmer Gauntlets 

Then space and and the number you wish to have, I always just use 1.

The theme of this mod is to give the creatures and equipment a more daedric aesthetic which I plan to use in upcoming project based around this concept.
At the moment this mod is a replacer version but once the construction set/kit is available I will make these iteme unique.

If you like this mod you might want to try Daedric Chaurus http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6962, Fiendish Falmer http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6955, Gory Draugrs (updating soon, check info) http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6803, and Undead Giants & Mammoths http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6562.

There will be further mods like this coming soon so look out for further releases.

Installation:

Extract the folder into the Skyrim data folder, default folder directory should be C:\\Program Files(x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\data.  If you have a mod that already retextures
the Falmer and/or their equipment then you will be prompted to overwrite files, say yes to all for this mod to take effect.

Uninstallation:

Go to 
data\\textures\\actors and remove the falmer folder
data\\textures\\armor and remove the falmerarmor folder
data\\textures\\weapons and remove the falmer folder
data\\meshes\\actors and remove the falmer folder
data\\meshes\\armor and remove the falmer folder
data\\meshes\\weapons and remove the falmer folder.  All gone!

If you have more mods active it might be a good idea to check these folders before deleting them in case there are additional files such as custom skeleton nif or normal map dds files, for example.

Tools used:

BSAopt, the ideal Skyrim BSA extraction program
Gimp 2.0, a really useful and free image editing program
Nifskope 1.1.0-RC5 - Latest version compatible with Skyrim meshes
author: Ironman5000
